executeOperation(address[],uint256[],uin.details: Ensure that the contract can return the debt + premium, e.g., has      enough funds to repay and has approved the Pool to pull the total amount

params.amounts: The amounts of the flash-borrowed assets
params.assets: The addresses of the flash-borrowed assets
params.initiator: The address of the flashloan initiator
params.params: The byte-encoded params passed when initiating the flashloan
params.premiums: The fee of each flash-borrowed asset

returns._0: True if the execution of the operation succeeds, false otherwise
address asset to be supplied to the v3 pool
returns._1: uint256 amount to be supplied to the v3 pool

migrate(address[],(address,uint256)[],(a.details: check more details about permit at PermitInput and /solidity-utils/contracts/oz-common/interfaces/draft-IERC20Permit.sol*

params.creditDelegationPermits: - list of EIP712 signatures (credit delegations) for v3 variable debt token
params.permits: - list of EIP712 permits, can be empty, if approvals provided in advance
params.positionsToRepay: - list of assets to be repayed

params.emergencyInput: - array of parameters to transfer out funds*

cacheATokens().notice: Public method to optimize the gas costs, to avoid having getReserveData calls on every execution*

executeOperation(address[],uint256[],uin.notice: Executes an operation after receiving the flash-borrowed assets

getMigrationSupply(address,uint256).notice: Method to get asset and amount to be supplied to V3

migrate(address[],(address,uint256)[],(a.notice: Method to do migration of any types of positions. Migrating whole amount of specified assets

rescueFunds((address,uint256,address)[]).notice: Public method for rescue funds in case of a wrong transfer
